website_summaries.verdict: Minecraft-style glasses are perfect favors for video game themed parties.
pros: Thick plastic frames are durable and stylish
Comes with 6 blue and 6 green sunglasses
Pixelated design fits in perfectly with Minecraft-themed parties
cons: Limited color selections, only 2 options available

customer_reviews.title: Half were perfect, half were not...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 24 and half were terrific. The blue glasses were perfect. Kids will love them! Unfortunately the green ones have some sort of white stuff stuck to the lenses. I can scrape off some, but the lens on the green ones is just not in good condition. I’m in a time crunch now for a party, so must use them. Wish I had looked at them sooner because now I’m spending precious party prep time trying to salvage these green glasses. Again, blue ones are perfect so maybe I just got a bad batch. It would have been nice if there were some quality checks prior to shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough how great these glasses were. Saw the reviews so that’s why I ordered them. I still was impressed with the quality. Parents of the party goers were also impressed that they also were UV 400 protective. My 6 year old grandson loved these and they fit him as well as my 12 year old nephew. These were definitely worth the price. Don’t hesitate to purchase them if you are considering a Minecraft themed event. Oh and tell Donald have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun glasses for b-day goodie bags!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the goodie bags for my son's 6th birthday party, and they were a big hit. The kids all called them "Minecraft glasses." Good quality. They fit both my 6 year old and my 12 year old, so they will work for a big range of face sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ford

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were so impressed with the quality of these sunglasses! For the price, we expected much cheaper plastic. We were surprised to receive a nice quality product. I'm pretty sure I saw the same (or similar) glasses at our local party store for about 10 times the price. We used these as a favor at my son's Minecraft birthday and the 9 year old boys loved them! (The girls were actually jealous that they received Minecraft stuffed animals instead of the sunglasses. That's how nice these sunglasses are!)
customer_reviews.author: nordkat

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are nice but be aware they ship from China
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are nice but be aware they ship from China. We got them 4 days after the party. No problem, we will give all the kids in his class sunglasses for their field day to end the school year but we did have to scramble last minute for party favors.
customer_reviews.author: Books for Life

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking! Great quality for the price—doesn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking! Great quality for the price—doesn't have a cheap plastic feeling. I bought these as party favors and a few months later still see my friends's children wearing these as sunglasses. Half items are blue in the package, but most kids wanted green. Just a thing to consider. Overall, I was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality birthday prize
customer_reviews.text: Now six months after the birthday party, the glasses are still looking good. Good quality for a birthday prize! Kids loved them at the party and a few adults wanted them too (a bit small on the adults but they still wanted to wear them).
customer_reviews.author: SkiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these and they stand up to heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these glasses as party favors. We handed them out at my son's Minecraft birthday party last year. These glasses are so durable that the kids are still wearing them a year later. My son and many of his friends wear these as their regular sunglasses. These are one of the best party favors I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: HeyHeyHelen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, had 11 kindergarteners and 1 dad (me) running around the backyard wearing these during my son's birthday party. Great price, they seem sturdy enough and the kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyBuddy'sDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these for our favor bags. I looked at each pair to make sure they were ok. Each pair I received was in perfect condition. They look great and seem sturdy. I’m sure the kids will love them!
customer_reviews.author: showard

customer_reviews.title: better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: They're sturdy & cute, better quality than I expected! We used them for a birthday party grab bag item in June & my kids have been wearing them all summer long
customer_reviews.author: Erika Green, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These were much better than I anticipated for an inexpensive party favor. They're sturdier than I thought they would be and the kids absolutely loved them. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Zinfandelina

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for a boys Minecraft Party, particularly when hosting at the pool. The are great feeling, cool looking, and don't feel cheap at all. The only reason I rated Durability a 4 is because we haven't hosted the party yet...of course my almost 8 year old has worn a pair of each color and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Casas

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price! All were in excellent condition and boxed very well. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NYPfeif

customer_reviews.title: Pixel sunglasses make a nice party treat!
customer_reviews.text: Great pixel sunglasses for a 9 year olds Minecraft birthday party. Glasses were a treat for his buddies and made a cute picture with everyone there. Nice and sturdy sunglassses. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SWitt

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and quality appearance
customer_reviews.text: High quality sunglasses. They fit 6 and 7 year olds very nicely. All of the kids at my grandsons birthday party really liked them. I highly recommend this item and would not hesitate to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for children’s birthday parties!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these for my son’s party. They arrived perfectly and they were a HUGE hit! The only thing I regret is not buying more because even the adults wanted a pair! They were so adorable and the kids LOVED the sunglasses. They are definitely made for kids— they are a little bit smaller (I could still wear them) and they were pretty sturdy even for the kids who were rough housing with them. I am so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Allison

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a party bag gift. They are actually very well made. Party attendees still wearing them around months after Birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor for Minecraft Party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of the blue and green pixel glasses for my 7 year old son's birthday party. The theme was Minecraft, so he was very excited to see the glasses in the goody bags. Quite thick and sturdy, plastic glasses, which were individually wrapped and in great condition. A bit expensive for plastic sunglasses, but I was happy with the product. The kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Sphynxcat

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: The kids really loved these glasses specially the green. The good thing is they have UV protection looks cool in photos. They came individually wrapped which is a plus!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Minecraft party bag stuffers!!
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of our Minecraft party!! 12 first graders and a few moms and dads ran around wearing these in the pool! Great quality and fit, 10/10 would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great value !

customer_reviews.title: The best!

customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and packaging. Bought these for my sons Minecraft themed party and the kids loved them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plastic

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses were a big hit at my son's Minecraft party. Many parents commented that the glasses are higher quality and not the cheap ones you buy at the dollar store. The sticker on the glasses states UV 400 protection.

product_meta.title: Kicko Pixel Sunglasses, Birthday Party Favors for Kids and Adults, 12 Pack
product_meta.description: Pixel sunglasses - birthday party favors - for kids & adults, enjoy the sun - by kaztco these sturdy sunglasses will keep you stylish and protected from harmful UV rays. Great for concerts, parties, day drinks, daylong, festivals and more these novelty glasses are also great to wear around all day. Katzco will make sure that you will be satisfied with this set you buy from us.
feature_bullets: ROBOTIC SHADES - This set contains 12 pieces of colored Kicko Robot Eye-wears: green and blue. Your day out won't be anything less than livelier with the 8-bit Block. Men and women can wear any of it to suit their fashion, personality, and mood.

BADASS OR GEEK - To get the most of indoor and outdoor experiences, give them Kicko Eye Accessory that features unique pixelated graphics frames. This fashionable one size fits all mosaic sunglasses will suit kids, teens and average sized adults.

GAMING NERD - Get these spectacles on at your next Minecraft or Sci-Fi themed parties, neon raves, band concerts, Computer and Science Fair, or birthdays. You can also flaunt these funky glasses while playing, on casual days or during a holiday vacation - at the beach or pool resort.

NOVELTY SUPPLIES - It comes in bulk for a team fun! It's an ideal goody bag fillers for Video Game lovers or prizes for any carnival festivities or summer bashes you are throwing. It's also a cool behavioral recompensation in class or incentives in the office.

COOL VISUAL EFFECT - Made of Polypropylene plastic, these UV Protected glasses are durable, ergonomic, odorless, eco-friendly and safe. These have really good quality, smooth edges, tight screws, lightweight, and glossy finish. Carefully wrapped for maximum protection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
